org.apache.oodt.commons.io

Class Base64DecodingInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • org.apache.oodt.commons.io.Base64DecodingInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class Base64DecodingInputStream
extends FilterInputStream
    An input stream that decodes its data from the RFC-1512 base 64 format. Wrap this input stream around another input stream, and all the bytes will be converted from their base-64 format when you read from it.
    Author:
    Kelly

      • read

        public int read(byte[] b,
                int offset,
                int length)
         throws IOException
        Read a bunch of bytes. This decodes base-64 data from the underlying stream and puts the result into the given array.
        Overrides:
        read in class FilterInputStream
        Parameters:
        b - The buffer to fill with decoded base-64 data.
        offset - Where in the buffer to start filling.
        length - How many bytes to fill.
        Returns:
        The actual number of decoded bytes.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

          throws IOException

        Overrides:
